alert.note: Alert for Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:53AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MARINETTE AND CENTRAL OCONTO COUNTIES THROUGH 645 AM CDT... At 553 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Gillett, or 22 miles northeast of Shawano, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Crivitz, Pound, Beaver, Spruce, Coleman, Breed, Suring, Hickory Corners, White Potato Lake, and Klondike. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
